languages.text: "Кузина, будь любезна — поблагодари беловолосую мон-кай еще пару раз. Выражение ее лица, когда она слышит похвалу от тебя... бесценно".
"Cousin, do me a favour and thank the white-haired mon-keigh a few more times. The look on her face when she hears praise from you... it is priceless."
languages.original_text: "Кузина, будь любезна — поблагодари беловолосую мон-кай еще пару раз. Выражение ее лица, когда она слышит похвалу от тебя... бесценно".

traits.locale_text: "Cousin, do me a favour and thank the white-haired mon-keigh a few more times. The look on her face when she hears praise from you... it is priceless."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Cousin, do me a favour and thank the white-haired mon-keigh a few more times. The look on her face when she hears praise from you... it is priceless."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Cousin, do me a favour and thank the white-haired mon-keigh a few more times. The look on her face when she hears praise from you... it is priceless."

traits.locale_text: "Cousin, do me a favour and thank the white-haired mon-keigh a few more times. The look on her face when she hears praise from you... it is priceless."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “表妹，帮我个忙，多感谢几次这只白发猴子吧。她听到你的感谢，脸上流露出的神情……真是无价之宝啊。”
languages.original_text: "Cousin, do me a favour and thank the white-haired mon-keigh a few more times. The look on her face when she hears praise from you... it is priceless."

traits.locale_text: “表妹，帮我个忙，多感谢几次这只白发猴子吧。她听到你的感谢，脸上流露出的神情……真是无价之宝啊。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Vous voulez bien me rendre service, chère cousine ? Remerciez de nouveau la mon-keigh dès que vous en aurez l'occasion. Sa réaction à vos éloges est tout simplement... désopilante. »
languages.original_text: "Cousin, do me a favour and thank the white-haired mon-keigh a few more times. The look on her face when she hears praise from you... it is priceless."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez bien me rendre service, chère cousine ? Remerciez de nouveau la mon-keigh dès que vous en aurez l'occasion. Sa réaction à vos éloges est tout simplement... désopilante. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Prima, por favor, dale las gracias a la mon-keigh de pelo blanco más veces. La cara que pone cuando la alabas... es algo impagable».
languages.original_text: "Cousin, do me a favour and thank the white-haired mon-keigh a few more times. The look on her face when she hears praise from you... it is priceless."

traits.locale_text: «Prima, por favor, dale las gracias a la mon-keigh de pelo blanco más veces. La cara que pone cuando la alabas... es algo impagable».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「いとこよ、白髪のモン＝ケイにちょっと感謝しといてくれ。お前の称賛を聞いたときのあの顔…超おもしろいぜ」
languages.original_text: "Cousin, do me a favour and thank the white-haired mon-keigh a few more times. The look on her face when she hears praise from you... it is priceless."

traits.locale_text: 「いとこよ、白髪のモン＝ケイにちょっと感謝しといてくれ。お前の称賛を聞いたときのあの顔…超おもしろいぜ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Base, tut mir einen Gefallen und dankt dem weißhaarigen Chem-Pan-Sey noch ein paar Mal. Ihr Gesichtsausdruck, wenn sie Lob von Euch hört ... ist unbezahlbar."
languages.original_text: "Cousin, do me a favour and thank the white-haired mon-keigh a few more times. The look on her face when she hears praise from you... it is priceless."

traits.locale_text: "Base, tut mir einen Gefallen und dankt dem weißhaarigen Chem-Pan-Sey noch ein paar Mal. Ihr Gesichtsausdruck, wenn sie Lob von Euch hört ... ist unbezahlbar."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Cousin, do me a favour and thank the white-haired mon-keigh a few more times. The look on her face when she hears praise from you... it is priceless."

languages.text: "Kuzen, bana bir iyilik yap da ak saçlı mon-keigh'e birkaç sefer daha teşekkür et. Senden övgü alınca yüzünde beliren o bakış... Paha biçilemez."
languages.original_text: "Cousin, do me a favour and thank the white-haired mon-keigh a few more times. The look on her face when she hears praise from you... it is priceless."

traits.locale_text: "Kuzen, bana bir iyilik yap da ak saçlı mon-keigh'ye birkaç kez daha teşekkür et. Senden övgü alınca yüzünde beliren o bakış... Paha biçilemez."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
